vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.35;
son of: Ephraim (H0669);
brother of: Becher (H1071H), Tahan (H8465), Ezer (H5827), Elead (H0496) and Beriah (H1283H);
father of: Eran (H6197) and Bered (H1260H)
Group of shu.te.lach (שׁוּתֶ֫לַח "Shuthelah" H7803)
§ Shuthalhites = see Shuthelah "freshly appointed"
descendants of Shuthelah, son of Ephraim, and of his son of the same name
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Sutélah, hijo de Efraín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書提拉族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 書提拉 "新任命"
以法蓮的兒子書提拉及同名子孫的後裔(民 26:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
书提拉族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 书提拉 "新任命"
以法莲的儿子书提拉及同名子孙的后裔(民 26:35)
